narrative:
This was a focused inspection conducted on 07-28-2015.  The original inspection was conducted on 07-20-2015. 
This inspection is focused on the Zebra foal who appeared thin.  The foal was taken to a veterinary clinic where she
was examined by a licensed veterinarian and given a treatment protocol.  The Zebra appears to have put on weight
and is feeling better.    
Focused inspection and exit interview conducted by R. Whiteley  and the owners.
